channel.title: Episodes on The Writer's Daily
channel.description: Recent content in Episodes on The Writer's Daily

item.title: #20 - Handwriting
item.description: The Question: What website do you use most? The Topic: I talk about my love for handwriting. The Viewermail: .

item.title: #19 - Estrangement
item.description: The Question: What do you enjoy most about your day? The Topic: Let’s talk about estrangement. The Viewermail: I help feed some hungry people.

item.title: #18 - Bitcoin
item.description: The Question: How long do you plan to work for? The Topic: The highs and lows of the bitcoin flow. The Viewermail: I’m a man obsessed with violence.

item.title: #17 - Standing Desk
item.description: The Question: What are you having for dinner tonight! The Topic: I stand at thy desk. The Viewermail: The nun wants to become a slut.

item.title: #16 - Tekken
item.description: The Question: How do you deal with stress? The Topic: The game that got me into fighters. The Viewermail: I help an asexual man out because I’m just a good guy.

item.title: #15 - High School
item.description: The Question: How much time do you spend on social media each day? The Topic: I hated high school like you cannot imagine. The Viewermail: Touched by God.

item.title: #14 - Journalism
item.description: The Question: How do you contribute towards society? The Topic: The call of the journalist. The Viewermail: Dealing with awful acnee.

item.title: #13 - Weed
item.description: The Question: Do you feel safe?. The Topic: I promise I’m not stoned. The Viewermail: Too much sand?

item.title: #12 - Podcasting
item.description: The Question: What worries you most about the future? The Topic: I am a podcaster, apparently. The Viewermail: Sushi. Sushi. Sushi.

item.title: #11 - Productivity
item.description: The Question: How much do you care about money?. The Topic: Becoming way too obsessed with productivity. The Viewermail: A listener wants to blow me.

item.title: #10 - Gold Stars
item.description: The Question: What are you worth? The Topic: Gold stars are apparently a bit like masturbation. The Viewermail: Dealing with a nasty divorce. thewritersdailypodcast@gmail.com

item.title: #9 - Breakfast
item.description: The Question: When was the last time you treated yourself? The Topic: What’s the deal with Breakfast? The Viewermail: It looks like a fan has developed Reade fever. thewritersdailypodcast@gmail.com

item.title: #8 - Monogamy
item.description: The Question: What do you do really well? The Topic: Stayin’ with da one gal. The Viewermail: I help a woman conceive.

item.title: #7 - Spotify
item.description: The Question: When was the last time you called your mother? The Topic: Music streaming becomes us all. The Viewermail: Overcoming bitchitis.

item.title: #6 - Centrelink
item.description: The Question: What can’t you live without? The Topic: Makin’ bank with Centrelink. The Viewermail: The guy has a small penis.

item.title: #5 - Work
item.description: The Question: What is the most important thing in your life? The Topic: Let’s talk about work. The Viewermail: Stage four cancer.

item.title: #4 - Food Delivery
item.description: The Question: What makes you happy? The Topic: Let’s talk about food delivery services. The Viewermail: What’s the deal with beef?

item.title: #3 - Greyhound
item.description: The Question: What excites you in life? The Topic: Adopting a greyhound. The Viewermail: Ying Ying wants a visa.

item.title: #2 - Quarantine
item.description: The Question: What do you do for your mental health everyday? The Topic: Getting through quarantine. The Viewermail: How to get your dad to stop beating you.

item.title: #1 - Beginning
item.description: The Question: What do you want to achieve today? The Topic: The very first show The Viewermail: The guy has a foot fetish.
